body_html:
Thanks for fixing, I just tested it by modifying my installed Tensorflow version and it works.
Another question! could we get the validation monitoring loss also? it's very interesting to see the evolution of validation loss
for the moment we can see only the loss and loss/mean of training process
thanks again
